detectors.description: Lottery.finishLottery() (../../../../../../tmp/ba16e360-bf57-4083-a16c-00e14ea6e205/lottery/Lottery.sol#70-99) uses a weak PRNG: "index = uint256(block.timestamp) % playerAddresses.length (../../../../../../tmp/ba16e360-bf57-4083-a16c-00e14ea6e205/lottery/Lottery.sol#73)"

Lottery.finishLottery() (../../../../../../tmp/ba16e360-bf57-4083-a16c-00e14ea6e205/lottery/Lottery.sol#70-99) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- index == count (../../../../../../tmp/ba16e360-bf57-4083-a16c-00e14ea6e205/lottery/Lottery.sol#78)

Lottery.callExternalFunction(address) (../../../../../../tmp/ba16e360-bf57-4083-a16c-00e14ea6e205/lottery/Lottery.sol#126-134) ignores return value by dummyContract.dummyFunction() (../../../../../../tmp/ba16e360-bf57-4083-a16c-00e14ea6e205/lottery/Lottery.sol#129-133)

Reentrancy in Lottery.callExternalFunction(address) (../../../../../../tmp/ba16e360-bf57-4083-a16c-00e14ea6e205/lottery/Lottery.sol#126-134):
	External calls:
	- dummyContract.dummyFunction() (../../../../../../tmp/ba16e360-bf57-4083-a16c-00e14ea6e205/lottery/Lottery.sol#129-133)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- ExternalCallFailed(External contract failed) (../../../../../../tmp/ba16e360-bf57-4083-a16c-00e14ea6e205/lottery/Lottery.sol#132)
	- ExternalCallSuccessful() (../../../../../../tmp/ba16e360-bf57-4083-a16c-00e14ea6e205/lottery/Lottery.sol#130)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Lottery.callExternalFunction(address)](../../../../../../tmp/ba16e360-bf57-4083-a16c-00e14ea6e205/lottery/Lottery.sol#L126-L134):
	External calls:
	- [dummyContract.dummyFunction()](../../../../../../tmp/ba16e360-bf57-4083-a16c-00e14ea6e205/lottery/Lottery.sol#L129-L133)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [ExternalCallFailed(External contract failed)](../../../../../../tmp/ba16e360-bf57-4083-a16c-00e14ea6e205/lottery/Lottery.sol#L132)
	- [ExternalCallSuccessful()](../../../../../../tmp/ba16e360-bf57-4083-a16c-00e14ea6e205/lottery/Lottery.sol#L130)
